com.group13.queries

Class Admin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.group13.queries.Admin

  • public class Admin
extends java.lang.Object
    The admin represents the owner of the database and contains functions to get relevant information

    To use this class, it must be given a User. This User must be the Admin, or it will be rejected.
    Keep in mind, when creating this, it's more like a LINK to the data. If there's no link (the user doesn't exist or isn't actually the admin), there's no data.
    Author:
    Conner Theberge

      • acceptUserRequest

        public void acceptUserRequest()
        Accepts the User's creator status request.

        Does NOT register them as a Creator. This function only sets the user's creator status.
